page.title: 13Biographies: Middleton
page.content: {Thomas Bateman}1821-1861 His family owned Middleton Estate from 1815 to 1913, rebuilt the village, enclosed the moor and empounded the waters of Bradford Dale. He was a passionate amateur archeologist, author and collector who excavated many prehistoric sites in the area. He lies in a field behind the Chapel. {Sir Christopher Fullwood}1590-1643 lived in the now ruined castle. He was treasurer of Grays Inn in 1637 and raised a Royalist army on Tideswell Moor in 1642. He was shot in Bradford Dale whilst escaping from Parliamentarians. The{Waterhouse}family in 1913 bought the Estate and live in the Hall. Major Hugo married Caroline second daughter of the 10th Duke of Marlborough who is a cousin of Sir Winston Churchill and of Diana Princess of Wales.
